lyrics.text:
Tama tūtuu’i, ē,
‘Alu, ‘o fai ho nafa:
Tō ‘i he ngaahi laumālie
‘A e ta’u he Pule’anga.

‘Alu ‘o laku noa,
Fai ki he ve’ehala,
Tō ‘i he ngoue fu’u vaoa,
He potu makamaka.

‘Oua ‘e loto fo’i,
‘Oua ‘e ofo fau,
Ka tātātaha ho’ ‘ilo’i
‘A e kelekele mahu.

‘Oku a’au ke maʻu,
Mo tō ‘a e pulopula;
‘Oku ‘a e ‘Eiki ‘o e Ta’u
‘A hono fakafua.

Fai, pea ‘oua e tuku,
Fai ‘aho mo e pō;
‘Oua ke hifo hono utu
Kau ngāue ‘āngelo.

Pea ke ‘ilo pau
‘A e tupu mo e mole
He kātoanga ‘o e ta’u;
Kae fakapale koe.
